Question: This person had risen to head draftsman and handled all residential design work in the office.
Hints: This person began to build himself a new home, which he called Taliesin, by May 1911.
Much of modern architecture, including the early work of Mies van der Rohe, can be traced back to this person's innovative work.
This person rebuilt the living quarters again, naming the home "Taliesin III".
